title: Detected Depot Statistics
description: Statistics for the detected Depots. Endpoint - https://api.route4me.com/api/v1/statistics/depot/detected/count-grouped

distinct.title: Distinct
distinct.description: Use distinct counter. Accepted values: [1/yes/true/0/no/false - GET.

original_api_key.title: Original Api key
original_api_key.description: Authorization by Route4Me key, for Route4Me users - GET.

x-api-key.title: X Api key
x-api-key.description: Use API with API key without authorization - HEADER.

x-auth-token.title: X Authentication Token
x-auth-token.description: Authorization token that will be given after signing in - HEADER.

auth_token.title: Authentication Token
